author: jeremias
msg: Bookmarks are now working in RTF output.

author: thorsten
msg: fixed typo in the style definition.

author: bago
msg: Fixed a major bug in smtp connection handling (james only accepted the first 5-10 smtp connections) (introduced in JAMES-407)

author: jeremias
msg: Border support on block, block-container and inline introduced. Nesting borders are supported partially: only two levels of nesting.
Consecutive paragraphs with identical border formatting are considered part
of a single group with the border information applying to the entire group.
start-indent and end-indent are used instead of margins only to do indentation.
Changes to the patch by jeremias:
Fix for deferred handling which didn't work for block-containers. They got ignored.
